name: Hoi An " Black & White" Bicycle Tour
description:
Hoi An, indeed, is a paradise to attract visitors coming to visit this lovely ancient town. This is " a must do" of cycling around Hoi An to see lots of interesting and spend a day forward countryside village. this tour is crafted for it. " Black & White" bicycle tour offers many routes for visitors have a panaromic view. You have a chance to experience of good feeling when biking through 2 sides of rice paddies, visit fish sauce workshop, meet locals to tell you how it is special, Highlight of tour is to chance of rowing basket boats and seeing water coconut forest, riding buffalo, eating seafood, moving to the beach, taking pics and lots of things you will never regret. enjoy with me to discover.
Mr. Sino (Nguyen)
